value.query: SELECT %vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c, %vlocity_namespace%__ProvisioningStatus__c, Product2.Name, Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c, Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__SubType__c, Product2.Family, %vlocity_namespace%__BillingAccountId__r.Name, %vlocity_namespace%__ServiceAccountId__r.Name, %vlocity_namespace%__EffectiveOneTimeTotal__c, %vlocity_namespace%__RecurringTotal__c, %vlocity_namespace%__OneTimeTotal__c, %vlocity_namespace%__EffectiveRecurringTotal__c, Order.AccountId FROM OrderItem WHERE OrderId = '{{parent.obj.OrderId}}' AND Order.AccountId = '{{params.Id || params.id}}'
